Mission High Foundation Spring '15 Dinner

6:00pm, May 13th @ Mission High School, SF CA

Support Mission High School with a donation

Honor Roll

$100
  • 1 Ticket to Spring '15 Dinner
  • 1 “I support Mission High” T-Shirt
  • recognition on website

Dean's List

$250
  • 2 Tickets to Spring '15 Dinner
  • 1 “I support Mission High” T-Shirt
  • recognition on website & Spring'15 dinner menu

Valedictorian

$500
  • 4 Tickets to Spring '15 Dinner
  • 2 “I support Mission High” T-Shirts
  • recognition on website & Spring'15 dinner menu

Cum Laude

$1000
  • 1 Table at Spring '15 Dinner (8 tickets)
  • 2 “I support Mission High” T-Shirts
  • recognition on website & Spring'15 dinner menu
  • Cum Laude Tour of Mission High

Magna Cum Laude

$2500
  • 1 Table at Spring '15 Dinner (8 tickets)
  • 2 “I support Mission High” T-Shirts
  • recognition on website & Spring'15 dinner menu
  • Magna Cum Laude Tour of Mission High

Summa Cum Laude

$5000
  • 1 Table at Spring '15 Dinner (8 tickets)
  • 2 “I support Mission High” T-Shirts
  • recognition on website & Spring'15 dinner menu
  • Summa Cum Laude Tour of Mission High
  • Invites to quarterly MHF stakeholder's dinners
